      • currentCamera

        private int currentCamera
        The current camera index. Used to switch between camera views. See the switchToNextCamera() method for more information.

        Basically a cache for disks to make animations easier to perform in a coherent manner.

        The indicator disks showing where disks may be placed.

        Parameters:
